about_the_game:
Sentient is a new combat sport which involves controlling powerful mechs via augmented reality and going head to head in a battle royale with other mechs, these battles are broadcast worldwide

The weapons fire disabling plasma projectiles that are effected by gravity, think of this game as robot paintball

Disclaimer
This is a game i worked my absolute a*se off making, i know it doesn't look that great but going from 2d game development to 3d UE4 moba was a huge undertaking for me with no experience in 3d game development and i've realised after about 12 months working on this game that i'm completely out of my depth but i still want people to enjoy the game so i have decided to release the game completely free to play

It's buggy and unrefined but i hope you find some enjoyment out of it!

Features:

4 Teams - Red, Blue, Green, Yellow
3 Classes- Sold13r, Med1k, Infiniltrat4r

Sold13r:
Can spawn defensive walls and ammo packs

Med1k:
Can create multiuser firing protection and health pulses

Infiltrat4r
Can create decoys to distract and disorient

1 Map - 4 teams of 5 go head to head in the Arena

How the game works:

4 teams start in their spawn zones and the spawn gate opens every few minutes, then all the teams are transported into the center arena and have to kill the opposing teams, the first team to get 25 kills wins

What if you die?

No problem, you will be transported back to the spawning zone and you can rejoin the battle when the game reopens
